metadata.synopsis: This gnome was saved from Moonrise Jail by the players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Free from jail in Moonrise, then talk in Haven.

0.speaker: Nimble
0.text: Aren't you going to take down Ketheric? We'll support you from here.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

1.speaker: Nimble
1.text: Oh! That'll be all, but thank you!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

2.speaker: Nimble
2.text: I suppose you'll be trotting off soon too. Don't let me stop you.

3.speaker: Nimble
3.text: I suppose this place will do for now. Better than a cell in the Towers, at the very least.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Arrogance; player has saved him and brought him here.

4.speaker: Nimble
4.text: I'd thank you for your help, but I doubt you need to hear such trivialities. So I'll just say fare-thee-well.

5.speaker: Nimble
5.text: I say, every last soldier in this place has abandoned us. So much for duty.

6.speaker: Nimble
6.text: Ketheric's forces are infiltrating this place - you've got to take the fight to them!
6.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.
